name: Retro Drift
description:
Hello, this is a simple retro car drifting game.

Game Features


  • Easy-to-use drift operation for one-handed play.
  • 4 retro cars, 3 mini track maps.
  • The number of AIs can be set, with a minimum of 0 and a maximum of 19, and a maximum of 20 cars can race at the same time.
  • Steam achievements support.
  • Steam leaderboard support.

Game Play


  • Make as many perfect drifts as possible and accumulate score.
  • Collect as many small wrenches as possible to increase your score.
  • Avoid obstacles on the road.
